Text.Text:
Place pieces where you want them to be set up.
Place defend markers to denote empty spaces;
it is recommended to have 2+ per land.
Change pieces' states to match their land's number.

Notes:
For pieces with Strife, only the Strife's state matters.
For balanced boards, do not place the starting
Beasts and Disease (added by BnC/JE rules).

"Update" will remove pieces currently placed
and update the board's code.

"Populate" will place pieces as per the
board's code, for easy editing.
